name: Poolbeg
description:
Although he leaves this shore,
he looks back more and more.
It is ever deep in his hearts core.

name: The flight of the earls
description: The end of the old gaelic order

name: Cill Mhantain
description:
A little cove where some monks landed
and were driven off by local people (Vikings?),
who threw stones that broke the teeth of one of the monks

name: Knockadoon
description:
Out of the mist, a horseman rode.
All my romantic responses explode.

name: A message
description:
A now deserted army camp purched by the sea,
a sense of ghost of young men in kaki, all dead and gone.
Now gull and crow live and breathe and the knowledge of the sea, we sadly unheed.

name: The old head of Kinsale
description:
When you walk afar,
waves pound the rocks,
in a glorious symphony.

name: Petite Bonhomme
description:
A story by Jules Vernes.
An orphan boy lets birds go free for sixpence.

name: Clew bay
description:
They rode, they fished,
they floated by,
in a bay so free.

name: A gift from the sea
description:
The sun glimmers on the water,
and sparkles on the stones,
Look again.

name: Valentia harbour
description:
Saint Fursey in the 6th century,
brought his stream of christianity,
to England and Europe.
He is mentioned in Ulysses.

name: Cuan Dhun Delgan
description:
In Dundalk bay,
this stone I found.
I could not leave it in the sand.
It made its way into my hand.

name: Torr head
description:
To Torr head and all in between,
complete silence over the sea.
Just a little bird and me,
tall elegant bird like cliff,
stands detached.
Suddenly a chowgh flies out to sea.

name: Malin head
description:
Looking back with my mind I see,
a magic coast full of history.

name: Dysert O'Dea 1
description:
Sharing their knowledge,
they came, they went.
Over the rolling waves,
the coast a welcome place of rest.

name: Dysert O'Dea 2
description:
Sharing their knowledge,
they came, they went.
Over the rolling waves,
the coast a welcome place of rest.

name: Ceallunach
description:
You little Celline, lie underground,
send bursting up a glory of flowers.
You are not forgotten.

name: Gifts from the sea
description:
The waters of life,
create a luminous garden.
